initiation: I believe everyone has a lot of ideas to share. Please feel free to start the discussion.
exploration: Could you elaborate on these viewpoints to make them more comprehensive, and try to connect different perspectives?
negotiation: There are now some differences, divergences, and details that need to be addressed. Please negotiate to resolve these parts.
I noticed that we still have not reached a consensus even through a lot of discussions. For each side, please summarize and state your stance on this conflict.
co_construction: Your discussion has been wonderful, and many valuable insights have emerged. Could you please summarize the current consensus comprehensively and think about whether it can be applied to other fields?
